EmailTemplate.subject: A320 Available for Parts
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>HONEYWELL AEROSPACE TRADING PURCHASES AIRBUS A320 FOR PART-OUT
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
RE-CERTIFIED AND AS-REMOVED PARTS FOR SALE
Honeywell Aerospace Trading has acquired yet another A320 Series aircraft for teardown. The disassembly process of this A320-214, MSN 0914 with a 1998 date of manufacture has commenced at E-Cube in Cardiff, Wales. Estimated completion is in February.
Removed components will be fully re-certified and available for sale or exchange immediately. A number of items will be available in As-Removed condition.
Honeywell Aerospace Trading continues to reinforce our support of the A320 family product line with strategic inventory acquisitions. We are a growing provider of Used Serviceable Material to aircraft operators and MROs world-wide via our global sales force and stocking locations in Europe, North America, and Asia-Pacific warehouses.
We appreciate your continued business support!
CONTACT US <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/HAT_A320.html?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_hat&utm_content=marketo]]>
Your friends at Honeywell Aerospace Trading
